name: World Summit on Cancer Science and Therapy
content: World Summit on Cancer Science and Therapy presents an unprecedented opportunity to meet and network with leading Doctors, surgeons, scientist, academician and professionals from around the world and listen to top speakers on new developments that will impact and advance the future of Cancer Science and Therapy 2nd World Summit on Cancer Science and Therapy(WSCST-17) practitioner-focused Congress will consolidate the endeavors made throughout world to advance the field of Medical through speakers and contributors who are acknowledged world leaders in their area of specialization.
